wbm: Caw ti tawng viag Corona an mawh viag yuh ka mawx?
Chix tiang haok ka maix khaing ceu in.
Jhawm saux chix pre yam jah rawm in.
Ot 6 sawk, chix tieb tie ka viag pa yie tiang hu.
Mah kheu nan, phan yaox pui mauk, miah mai saux caw ti hawt been awm pa koe plak greem awx.
Tawx pa tawb meeh (mask) ka kix. Kheu miah, mauk nawh kadaux man tawb meeh, chix tieb tie ka pui pa koe rob rem tix heue.
Viang nawh ang saux kawx nawh chix tieb tie tokaux tix.
Saux viag koe mie ding kaux ang chix goih tawng mawh kheu nan chix tiang hu khaing heue.
Kheu ex ang chix tawng pui mawx pa koe jhawm saux viag, caw tix via khaing dee ot pui hun heue.
Khaix an mia pui saux kawx chix koe ka kraung shiao. Lox tiag
Chix tiang saux ka maix mai kix uik heue.
Giex ka ngai baoh pui pa moh
Phan maix krox ngai baoh tix khaing giex ceu an
Phan sang tieb tie caw ti khoek taix tix singax mhawm ka sidah khoek mai rawm sidah plai.
Viag an pon ot im ka piang kraung shiao tom rheung heue.
Ceu pa caw ti yuh son krax tieb tie
-      Phan hawt yuh awm an mawh pa nie mhawm heue.
Paw teeh ka ngai baoh tix (a) ngai baoh pui tang kaux. Phan lo ti krox caw ti khoek taix tix ka sidah khoek mhawm mhawm heue.
Kieh rheeng bawgyam awm ah lox lai iak ra bawg awx
Phan piawm krox paw khi rhawm caw ti khoek taix tix ka sidah khoek mhawm mhawm heue.
Paw krox ka plak praix man tawb meeh.
Phan rheung jheep man tawb meeh tix mu viag chix ot ti ting daux man an heue.
Man tawb meeh shiao tix bawg paw shiao lheu khaing tix ngaix phan maox bhaw caw ti tik heue.
Kieh tang shiao man ot cao tix.
Paw riem shiao ka kraung, kawk rawm, man awt mai priex ih tau.
Maix ang chix yuh jhong taix maix hu krox ka ngaix baoh maix ceeix kawx heue.
Phan sang paoh siviex paoh ka jhong taix (a) nyheen paoh ka klip tix. Paw paoh ka taix tix.
Khoek taix ka sidah khoek sijheeng
Ot mhawm khaing krax lhat graung

Pui pa nyawm ot Pui koe jhawm saux  Jhawm saux chix pre yam jah rawm in.  Ot 6 sawk, chix tieb tie ka viag pa yie tiang hu. 1  6 sawk     Haik cho  Mah kheu nan, phan yaox pui mauk, miah mai saux caw ti hawt been awm pa koe plak greem awx.  Tawx pa tawb meeh (mask) ka kix. Kheu miah, mauk nawh kadaux man tawb meeh, chix tieb tie ka pui pa koe rob rem tix heue. 2 Ting buan son (pui miah)  Phan ang mawh nan  Viang nawh ang saux kawx nawh chix tieb tie tokaux tix.  Saux viag koe mie ding kaux ang chix goih tawng mawh kheu nan chix tiang hu khaing heue.   Kheu ex ang chix tawng pui mawx pa koe jhawm saux viag, caw tix via khaing dee ot pui hun heue. Thu shiao  Pui nyawm ot  maox giex taix daux cheu pa yeen daux bawng cag plah ce kawk rawm   kraung cag pa shiao   Plak praix man tawb meeh  Taix haok bawng  Maok   Gawng tiiem  Pang siviex  Taix nawh  Khaix an mia pui saux kawx chix koe ka kraung shiao. Lox tiag  Chix tiang saux ka maix mai kix uik heue. Giex ka ngai baoh pui pa moh  Giex ngai tix  Phan maix krox ngai baoh tix khaing giex ceu an  Phan sang tieb tie caw ti khoek taix tix singax mhawm ka sidah khoek mai rawm sidah plai. Viag an pon ot im ka piang kraung shiao tom rheung heue.   Sidah khoek   Ceu pa caw ti yuh son krax tieb tie -      Phan hawt yuh awm an mawh pa nie mhawm heue.  Khoek tom hoek dee in  Sidah khoek  Jhong taix Paw teeh ka ngai baoh tix (a) ngai baoh pui tang kaux. Phan lo ti krox caw ti khoek taix tix ka sidah khoek mhawm mhawm heue.  Kieh rheeng bawgyam awm ah lox lai iak ra bawg awx Kadaux nghim taix  Rheeng 20 siekan  Sinax giien taix  Khoek plah taix   Kudah ah mawh pa tix?  Phan piawm krox paw khi rhawm caw ti khoek taix tix ka sidah khoek mhawm mhawm heue.  Paw krox ka plak praix man tawb meeh.  Rawm jah ba koe viag. Phan rheung jheep man tawb meeh tix mu viag chix ot ti ting daux man an heue.  Man tawb meeh shiao tix bawg paw shiao lheu khaing tix ngaix phan maox bhaw caw ti tik heue.  Shiao lawk tuh puk taux -  Kawn  Keeing  Miex  Kieh tang shiao man ot cao tix.  Paw riem shiao ka kraung, kawk rawm, man awt mai priex ih tau.  Maix ang chix yuh jhong taix maix hu krox ka ngaix baoh maix ceeix kawx heue. Phan sang paoh siviex paoh ka jhong taix (a) nyheen paoh ka klip tix. Paw paoh ka taix tix.
